sentences.english: A bridge will simply send packets from the wire to the wireless and back.
sentences.chinese: 網橋僅僅在有線網和無線網之間傳遞數據包。

sentences.english: Provision of the Internal Sublayer Service within the MAC Bridge.
sentences.chinese: 在MAC網橋內的內部子層服務的規定。

sentences.english: Create a remote queue definition to the bridge queue and add an alias.
sentences.chinese: 創建到網橋隊列的遠程隊列定義並添加別名。

sentences.english: The queue manager proxy must be associated with the bridge object previously created.
sentences.chinese: 隊列管理器代理必須與先前創建的網橋對象相關聯。

sentences.english: With the evolution of bridges and switches with fast integrated circuits, a new mode of operation is usually available: cut-through.
sentences.chinese: 隨着高速集成電路的發展，網橋和交換機也在進化。

sentences.english: Being skilled in building bridges, they are famous for the construction of wooden and rattan bridges.
sentences.chinese: 門巴族擅長建橋，以門巴木橋和藤網橋著名。

sentences.english: Starting the bridge will by default start all the child objects too.
sentences.chinese: 啓動網橋時也將缺省啓動所有的子對象。

sentences.english: The spanning-tree algorithm is recalculated by the bridges to determine any necessary changes in the path.
sentences.chinese: 生成樹協議將依照網橋檢測到的變化重新計算路徑。

sentences.english: A root bridge is elected as the root of the spanning-tree topology.
sentences.chinese: 生成樹拓撲內的網橋共同選舉出根網橋。

sentences.english: A root bridge is elected as the root of the spanning-tree topology.
sentences.chinese: 生成樹拓撲內的網橋共同選舉出根網橋。

sentences.english: These multiport bridges were called switching hubs or Ethernet switches.
sentences.chinese: 這些多端口網橋叫交換式集線器或以太網交換機。

sentences.english: An arbitrary name is needed for the bridge object.
sentences.chinese: 需要爲網橋對象指定一個任意的名稱。

sentences.english: This acts as the parent for all the other bridge related objects.
sentences.chinese: 它作爲全部其他網橋相關對象的父對象。

sentences.english: Each bridge queue must be associated with an individual client connection.
sentences.chinese: 每個網橋隊列必須與單獨的客戶端連接相關聯。
